about_the_game:
About This Game

Step into the eerie, endless halls of Backrooms in this intense multiplayer horror experience. Designed for up to 6 players in online co-op, you and your friends must navigate unsettling mazes, solve cryptic puzzles, and avoid the unspeakable horrors that lurk within.

Key Features:

  • Realistic Graphics & Environments: Experience highly detailed visuals and immersive environments that bring the unsettling world of The Backrooms to life with stunning realism.

  • Multiplayer Survival: Work together or split up as you explore the ever-shifting Backrooms. Communication and teamwork are your greatest tools for survival.

  • Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Realistic environments and dynamic lighting pull you into the terrifying world of forgotten rooms and impossible spaces.

  • Terrifying Enemies: Ruthless entities patrol the levels, each with unique behaviors. Hide, run, and stay quiet — survival depends on your instincts.

  • 8 Challenging Levels: Explore claustrophobic corridors, eerie open spaces, and intricate puzzles across multiple levels. New content and levels are regularly added to keep you on edge.

  • Co-op Puzzles & Escape Mechanics: Work together to find keys, solve riddles, and unlock exits while avoiding dangers at every turn.

Do You Have What It Takes?

Survival requires strategy, stealth, and nerves of steel. Stay close to your team or risk getting lost forever. The Backrooms are merciless — the monsters don’t care how many players remain.

Prepare yourself. Escape is possible, but only if you work together.

short_description: A visually realistic 1-6 player co-op survival horror game. Explore 8 levels filled with confined environments, puzzles, and entities, with new levels and content constantly being added. Beware of terrifying moments and ruthless Monsters , do whatever it takes to escape, hide if you must.
